Package com.orchestranetworks.addon.dint.transformation

Interface TransformationDefinition<I,​O>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - The input value type. Must be compatible with InputDefinition.getType().
    O - The output value type. Must be compatible with OutputDefinition.getType().
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    com.orchestranetworks.addon.dint.transformation.conversion.AbstractDateTimeToStringTransformationDefinition, com.orchestranetworks.addon.dint.transformation.conversion.AbstractStringToDateTimeTransformationDefinition, AggregateTransformationDefinition, BooleanToString, ConversionTransformationDefinition, CrossReference, CrossReferenceTransformationDefinition, DateTimeToString, DateToString, DecimalToString, IntegerAggregate, IntegerToString, com.orchestranetworks.addon.dint.transformation.conversion.LocaleBasedConversionTransformationDefinition, SplitTransformationDefinition, StringConcat, StringSplit, StringToBoolean, StringToDate, StringToDateTime, StringToTime, StringToURI, StringUpperCase, TimeToString
    public interface TransformationDefinition<I,​O>
    Definition of a transformation.
    Since:
    4.1.0
